properties.Name: Fun Center Amstelveen
properties.description: Ideal 4-12 years. Massive indoor activity center in Amstelveen with 30+ connected trampolines, tumbling track, foam pit, lasertag arena, arcade games, XXL table football, pool tables, karaoke rooms, F1 simulators.

properties.Name: KidZcity
properties.description: Ideal 2-11 years. Largest indoor amusement park in Utrecht with climbing castle, funhouse obstacles, balloon ride, bumper cars, jungle train, ball cannons, lasertag, carousel, toddler corner, traffic track.

properties.Name: The Bubblejungle
properties.description: Ideal 2-12 years. Underwater-themed indoor adventure center near Leiden with multi-level play towers, trampolines, ball pits, climbing walls, toddler zones, glow mini-golf, lasergame, escape rooms, arcade games, camel races, bubble cars.

properties.Name: Avontuurfabriek
properties.description: Ideal 4-12 years. Massive indoor adventure center in Loosdrecht with Spelekids playground (10m climbing towers, trampolines, toddler zone), LED bowling, 3D fluorgolf, lasertag, karting, escape rooms; kids' parties with customizable activities and meals.

properties.Name: Belevenissenbos
properties.description: Ideal for ages 4-12. Largest adventure play forest in NL with 140+ natural obstacles, rope bridges over water, survival courses + island hopping. Free entry (suggested €1 donation), changing rooms + spare clothes.

properties.Name: Klimpark Fun Forest
properties.description: Ages 6+ recommended / 110cm height requires. Treetop adventure courses in Amsterdamse Bos. 3hr sessions. Closed shoes required.

properties.Name: Het Woeste Westen
properties.description: Ideal 3-12 years. Largest natural adventure playground in Westerpark, Amsterdam with islands connected by wobbly bridges, streams, mud pits, water pumps, climbing hills, willow huts, forest trails for free play, hut-building, campfires. Coffee, tea, snacks available for purchase during opening hours.

properties.Name: Plaswijckpark
properties.description: Ages 0-10. Rotterdam's ultimate play paradise with massive indoor/outdoor climbing playgrounds, petting zoo, water play, free boat/train rides, midgetgolf, cable car, carousel.

properties.Name: De Bosspeeltuin
properties.description: Ideal 2-12 years. Large wooden adventure playground in Utrecht's Maximapark (Leidsche Rijn/Vleuten) with elevated tree trunk walkways, climbing towers, giant slide, cable car, water pump sluice system, tree swing, open-air amphitheater with surprise water jets, toddler area.

properties.Name: Avonturenspeelplaats
properties.description: Ideal 3-12 years. Pirate-themed adventure playground in Het Twiske recreation area with climbing towers, fort, cable car, ferries, swings, giant slide, pirate ship, treasure chest. Adjacent playing fields and kiosk.

properties.Name: AquaZoo Leerdam
properties.description: All ages. Compact indoor aquarium with 40+ tanks (sharks, piranhas, seahorses, poison dart frogs). Child-height viewing stools, interactive quiz. Small café. Quiet, uncrowded.

properties.Name: WOW Family Center De Pijp
properties.description: Ages 0-9. Family hub with parent-child sensory play, Baby Sensory (0-6m), Toddler Sense music/gym/dance (1-4), Mini Professors hands-on science experiments. Camps available for ages up to 9. Cozy play café for parents.

properties.Name: WOW Family Center De Rivierenbuurt
properties.description: Ages 0-9. Family hub with parent-child sensory play, Baby Sensory (0-6m), Toddler Sense music/gym/dance (1-4), Mini Professors hands-on science experiments. Camps available for ages up to 9. Cozy play café for parents.

properties.Name: Kids Art Club Amsterdam
properties.description: Ideal 4-12. Bilingual Dutch-English art club with drawing, painting, collage, clay workshops inspired by famous artists; drop-in or structured classes build skills, creativity, confidence

properties.Name: Rijksmuseum
properties.description: Great for ages 4-12. Rijksmuseum kids trail, audio guides, family tours, scavenger hunts, workshops, and theater turn 17th-century masterpieces into interactive adventures.

properties.Name: The Mouse Mansion
properties.description: Ideal 3-10. Whimsical free-entry mini museum/shop displays intricate handmade mouse world—tiny rooms, rollercoaster, fair, harbor with Sam & Julia characters from books.

properties.Name: The LEGO Store Amsterdam
properties.description: Ideal for ages 4-12. Official LEGO store with build-your-own station + play area. Free build workshops Saturdays. Pick-a-brick wall!

properties.Name: Luchtvaartmuseum Aviodrome
properties.description: Ideal 2-12. Giant planes to explore, flight simulators, outdoor runway playground, and speurtocht diploma—perfect for plane-obsessed kids.

properties.Name: Royal Baby Spa
properties.description: Ages 0-12 months. Intimate baby spa in Amsterdam Zuid with with hydrotherapy floating in warm purified water, baby massage, and relaxation for better sleep and parent-baby bonding.

properties.Name: The Baby Club
properties.description: Ages 0-12 months. Intimate baby spa in Amsterdam Zuid with with hydrotherapy floating in warm purified water, baby massage, and relaxation for better sleep and parent-baby bonding.

properties.Name: Rein Wellness Spa
properties.description: Ages 0-12 months. Intimate baby spa in Amsterdam Zuid with with hydrotherapy floating in warm purified water, baby massage, and relaxation for better sleep and parent-baby bonding.

properties.Name: BabySpa Overtoom
properties.description: Ages 0-8 months. Private baby spa sessions in central Amsterdam with hydrotherapy floating in warm purified water, baby massage, and relaxation for better sleep and parent-baby bonding.

properties.Name: Mini Captain
properties.description: Ages 4-12. Kid-powered electric mini boats in Amsterdamse Bos—steer police, fire, rescue, ferry, or cruise ships yourself at 5km/h. Earn a captain's diploma; max 4 per boat (2 kids + 2 adults).

properties.Name: Hortus Botanicus Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam
properties.description: Ideal ages 2+. Historic university botanical garden in Amsterdam Zuid with tropical/desert greenhouses, medicinal herb garden, bamboo forest, carnivorous plants, butterfly pavilion, ponds with water lilies; peaceful paths and benches for family strolls.

properties.Name: Hortus Botanicus
properties.description: Ideal ages 2+. Historic botanical garden with tropical/subtropical/desert greenhouses. Palm house, butterfly pavilion, carnivorous plants, medicinal garden, duck pond. Oranjerie café.

properties.Name: Keukenhof Gardens
properties.description: All ages. World's largest flower garden with 7M+ tulips. Miffy playground, natural playground, petting zoo (lambs, goats, pot-bellied pigs), hedge maze. Multiple cafés. Bike paths through surrounding tulip fields. Open Spring only.

properties.Name: Vlindersafari
properties.description: All ages. Tropical butterfly garden with dozens of species flying freely. Hands-on feeding, treasure hunt for kids, biologist-led tours. Expressive garden paths. Terrace café.

properties.Name: Vlindertuin Mot in Mokum NoordOogst
properties.description: Ideal 2+. Butterfly garden at NoordOogst urban farm. Native Dutch butterflies & caterpillars. Gardens, educational workshops. Learn butterfly-friendly gardening.

properties.Name: Wonderpark Café
properties.description: Ideal 1-9 years. Sustainable indoor playground café in Amstelveen with climbing structures, slides, ball pit for creative free play. Parents relax nearby with healthy breakfast, lunch, dinner, coffee while watching kids.

properties.Name: Theehuis Bos En Hei
properties.description: Ideal 2-8 years. Forest café near Naarden with large playground (covered sandpit with toys, trampoline, swings, slides, playhouse); adjacent 1km gnome trail with task booklet (€5). Perfect lunch/picnic spot after a walk through the forest.

properties.Name: Coffee and Kids
properties.description: Ideal 1-5 years. Specialty coffee bar combined with BSO/afterschool care and creative play space. Coffee for parents, daily toddler workshops (crafting, painting, theater), free playroom with toys/stage when no classes. Coworking mornings with nanny service.

properties.Name: Papote
properties.description: Ideal for ages 0-6. New family cafe in De Baarsjes opening Jan 30, 2026 with indoor play area + seasonal shareable food/drinks for all ages. Thoughtful design for modern parents + kids.

properties.Name: Caffènation Amsterdam
properties.description: All ages; play area suitable for younger kids (1-4). Cozy specialty coffee café in Amsterdam Zuid near Vondelpark with excellent espresso, oat cappuccinos, banana bread, tosti's. Family-friendly vibe plus dedicated kids play area downstairs and outdoor terrace.

properties.Name: Kweekcafe
properties.description: Ideal 0-6 years. Sustainable greenhouse café in Haarlem's Haarlemmer Kweektuin with organic coffee, seasonal lunch, cakes; adjacent petting zoo (watch chickens/ducks/rabbits), toddler play corner, park trails.

properties.Name: Kiem Lokaal
properties.description: Ideal 0-6 years. Sustainable parent-child green café in Wachterliedplantsoen, Amsterdam West, offering organic drinks, veggie soups/broodjes from the community farm's eggs and garden herbs. Kids play with wooden toys, ride bikes for smoothies. Nature workshops, theater shows + other activities with community center.

properties.Name: lePita
properties.description: All ages. Cozy Middle Eastern street food spot in Amsterdam Zuid serving authentic falafel, shawarma, hummus, fluffy fresh pita. Warm family-friendly atmosphere with play corner and highchairs.

properties.Name: Grand Café Het Paviljoen
properties.description: All ages; adjacent playground ideal for 2+. Lively indoor/outdoor café near Westpark, perfect for family lunches, brunches or casual drinks while kids play at the playground.

properties.Name: Coffee Bru
properties.description: Kid-friendly cafe, ideal for ages 1-6. Specialty coffees, baked goods, simple breakfast items. Small indoor play corner + nice outdoor area in the warmer months.

properties.Name: Bio Buurtwinkel Sans
properties.description: Ideal 2-6 years. Organic neighborhood shop & café in Amsterdam Noord. Coffee, lunch snacks, verpakkingsvrij products, patisserie. Games available, family-friendly park vibe.

properties.Name: Boerderij Meerzicht
properties.description: All ages; playground ideal 2-8 years. Traditional pancake house in Amsterdamse Bos. Pancakes + huge outdoor seating area with large playground. Deer + peacocks.

properties.Name: Café Belcampo
properties.description: All ages; small play area ideal 1-4 years. Café inside OBA De Hallen library with coffee, sandwiches, and pastries.

properties.Name: Club Abbey
properties.description: Ideal 1-6 years. Family café in Amsterdam Oost designed for parents and kids. Features indoor playground with ball pit, slide, train table, coloring stations. Breakfast, lunch, healthy snacks, kids portions.

properties.Name: Mundi
properties.description: All ages; toys/small play area ideal 1-6 years. Cozy café/shop near Westerpark with coffee, house-made banana muffins, matcha, wines. Relaxed atmosphere with outdoor seating.

properties.Name: NIO House Amsterdam
properties.description: Ideal ages 0-5. EV showroom with cafe on second floor + dedicated play area. Additional enclosed soft play space + changing tables on third floor.

properties.Name: Park Kiosk BEA
properties.description: Ideal 1-6 years. Seasonal kiosk in Beatrixpark selling ice creams, iced lattes, toasties, coffee, snacks. Perfectly positioned by wading pool and playground.

properties.Name: taal.coffee
properties.description: All ages; play area ideal 1-5 years. Specialty coffee café  with cozy minimal interior and dedicated play area downstairs for children so parents can relax.

properties.Name: Terrasmus
properties.description: Ideal 1-6 years. Erasmuspark café serving coffee, fresh juices, sandwiches, cakes, and ice cream. Adjacent playground keep kids busy while parents relax. Small indoor play corner.

properties.Name: Toetie & Bo Kidscafe
properties.description: Ideal 1-6 years. Kidscafé with various play areas, arts & crafts. Children's high tea + other specialty kid's events (princess breakfast). Parents enjoy coffee, cakes, healthy kids meals in relaxed lounge area. Changing tables, high chairs, cribs available.

properties.Name: Kasteel Assumburg
properties.description: Ideal 3-12. Historic castle grounds + cafe in Heemskerk with barok garden treasure hunts, workshops for kids, and spacious park play areas for running, hiding, and exploring.

properties.Name: Kasteel de Haar
properties.description: Ideal 3-12. Largest Dutch castle with indoor/outdoor treasure hunts, deer feeding, hedge maze racing, and knight/princess rooms.

properties.Name: Muiderslot Castle
properties.description: Ideal 3-12. Medieval fortress with kids' treasure hunts, tower climbs, armor try-ons, knight audio tours, falconry demos, and jousting—defend the moat like Floris V! Nice playground with castle views + cafe with indoor play area.

properties.Name: Ruine van Brederode
properties.description: Ideal 5-12. Medieval castle ruins near Haarlem to explore with kids' costumes, wooden horses, treasure hunts, tower climbs for panoramic views, and knight games.

properties.Name: NoordOogst Stadslandbouwproject
properties.description: All ages. Urban farm with natuurspeeltuin, food forest, vegetable gardens. Harvest-your-own veggies (membership), kids workshops, animals to watch. Farm-to-table Restaurant Pof. Picnic areas.

properties.Name: Kinderboerderij Amstelpark
properties.description: Ideal 2-10 years. Free city farm in Amsterdam's Amstelpark with goats, sheep, donkeys, chickens, rabbits, guinea pigs, mini horses for petting and feeding. Adjacent playground.

properties.Name: Boerderij Westerpark
properties.description: All ages. Urban farm in Westerpark with cows, pigs, sheep, chickens. Hands-on animal feeding. Hooikeet café serves coffee, apple pie. Playground nearby.

properties.Name: Geitenboerderij Ridammerhoeve
properties.description: Best ages 1-8. Organic goat farm in Amsterdamse Bos. Pet + bottle feed baby goats. Nice playground + cafe with indoor/outdoor seating. Delicious goat ice cream!

properties.Name: Kinderboerderij De Buiktuin
properties.description: All ages. Cozy neighborhood petting farm in Amsterdam-Noord. Goats, bunnies, chickens, pigs. Adjacent playground. Daily animal care demos.

properties.Name: Wijkboerderij Wachterlied
properties.description: All ages. Neighborhood farm in Wachterliedplantsoen with goats, sheep, chickens to pet & feed. Adjacent playground. Kids nature/crafts workshops.

properties.Name: Zimmerhoeve kinderboerderij
properties.description: All ages. City farm in Amsterdam-West with goats, sheep, pigs, rabbits, chickens. Hands-on feeding. Adjacent playground with sand/water play table.

properties.Name: Kinderboerderij De Uylenburg
properties.description: Ideal 1-8 years. One of Amsterdam's oldest city farms in Rembrandtpark with pettable animals like goats, sheep, donkeys, ponies, pigs, rabbits, birds, cats (plus free-roaming chickens/ducks). Adjacent playground, picnic terrace, and educational animal care.

properties.Name: Boerderij Zorgvrij
properties.description: Ideal 1-10 years. Educational city farm in Spaarnwoude recreation area with pettable animals (cows, sheep, pigs, goats, chickens, rabbits), milking demos, cheese-making workshops, large playground, spinnenbos adventure area, uilenbos trails, geurtuin sensory garden, and picnic spots—great for hands-on farm experiences.

properties.Name: Omniversum
properties.description: Ideal 3-12. Massive Dome theater wraps 360° films around you—explore global wonders, deep sea adventures, space journeys on half-football-field screen. Interactive museum with Discovery Lab.

properties.Name: The Concertgebouw
properties.description: All ages. Iconic Amsterdam concert hall with superb acoustics, hosting family concerts for kids of all ages by top orchestras—Sunday matinees, interactive music programs, storytelling with instruments.

properties.Name: Sterk in Eten Kinderkookschool
properties.description: Ages 4-12. Hands-on kids' cooking school where children chef their own healthy meals, learn knife skills, baking, and global recipes in a fun, supportive group. Themed workshops build confidence, creativity, and love for nutritious food with take-home creations and recipes.

properties.Name: Kinderkookkafé
properties.description: Ages 2-12. Kids cook, bake, and serve in their own café at the edge of Vondelpark. Indoor and outdoor seating. Small outdoor play area.

properties.Name: Wereldmuseum Amsterdam
properties.description: Ages 4-12. Global cultures spark wonder via touchable artifacts, music workshops, storytelling, and dress-up in immersive world galleries for curious explorers.

properties.Name: Damoves Peuter- en Kleuterdans
properties.description: Creative dance classes for toddlers (2-3 years), preschoolers (4-6 years), and kids (6-10) at Studio Damoves and Kinderkookkafé by Vondelpark. Playful themes teach movement, musicality, coordination through ballet/jazz/musical. Parent-child classes also available.

properties.Name: DanceMatic
properties.description: Dance school in Amsterdam Noord offering dance classes from 2+ in a number of styles (ballet, hip hop, modern/jazz). Cozy atmosphere focused on fun, confidence, and development.

properties.Name: Amsterdam Kids Drama & Dance
properties.description: Ideal ages 2-10. Playful English-language drama + dance classes in Vondelpark-view studio. Builds confidence, theatre skills, and teamwork with immersive parent-child sessions for toddlers leading to shows for older kids.

properties.Name: Young Theatre Makers
properties.description: 7+. English-language youth theatre program at Clifford Studio for ages 7-18. Weekly drama classes focus on improv, physical theatre, devising original pieces ending in family performances. Builds confidence through collaborative storytelling.

properties.Name: Eye Filmmuseum
properties.description: Ages 6+ for museum; Cinemini events for 2-6. Interactive film exhibits, animation workshops, and kid tours explore cinema magic with hands-on editing, sound effects, and stop-motion stations—perfect for young storytellers.

properties.Name: Aapjeskooi Peutergym Amsterdam West
properties.description: Ages 1.5-6. Playful parent-child gym classes with imaginative themes. Climb, swing, roll, balance in themed gym rooms. Builds motor skills, confidence, social development. Oost & West locations.

properties.Name: Aapjeskooi Peutergym Amsterdam Oost
properties.description: Ages 1.5-6. Playful parent-child gym classes with imaginative themes. Climb, swing, roll, balance in themed gym rooms. Builds motor skills, confidence, social development. Oost & West locations.

properties.Name: The Little Gym Amsterdam
properties.description: Ideal 4 months-12 years. Gymnastics classes for babies (4 months) through preteens in Amsterdam Zuid; parent-child sessions build motor skills, confidence, social skills through themed weekly lessons with small groups and trained instructors.

properties.Name: Ponymanege Equito
properties.description: Ages 7-12 years. Pony riding school in Amstelveen near Amsterdam with sweet ponies for kids' lessons in dressage, jumping, pony games, trail riding; Ponyvriendjes intro course teaches grooming, ground work first; Young Leader program covers full horse care.

properties.Name: Hollandsche Manege
properties.description: Activities avilable from 3+. Historic indoor riding school with pony lessons, horse riding for older kids. Visit Equestiran museum + stables to get up close with horses. Upstairs cafe with view of riding hall.

properties.Name: Fabrique des Lumières
properties.description: Suggested for ages 5+ but enjoyable for all ages. Giant immersive art projections (Van Gogh, Klimt) in Westergasfabriek. 30-min shows with mesmerizing light, no talking needed.

properties.Name: WONDR Experience
properties.description: Ages 2+. Interactive wonderland with Pink Beach, roller dreams disco, mirror halls, and dazzling rooms for family play—let inner child run free with laughter and photo ops.

properties.Name: Playhood
properties.description: Ages 2+. Imaginative neighborhood playground with role-play shops & houses. Unique birthday party venue. Coffee, DIY pizza & other bites. Relaxed vibe vs typical indoor jungles. Book in advance.

properties.Name: Nijntje Museum
properties.description: Ideal ages 2-6. Interactive museum in Utrecht based on Nijntje (Miffy) books. Series of miniature rooms for hands-on, immersive play. Cafe with Nijntje-themed bites. Book timeslots ahead.

properties.Name: WOPL! (World of Play & Learning)
properties.description: Best for ages 0-6. Immersive and educational play with soft play area for toddlers. Cafe with play corner. Near Olympic Stadium.

properties.Name: Kinderspeelparadijs Het Speelkasteel
properties.description: Ideal 1-12 years. Massive indoor/outdoor playground in Hoofddorp with giant climbing castle, slide, mega ball pit, toddler area (0-4 years), outdoor pirate ship, air trampoline.

properties.Name: Funmania Aalsmeer
properties.description: Ideal 4-12 years. Massive indoor adventure playground near Schiphol with multi-level climbing courses (zones by height), trampoline park, slides, obstacle runs, glow mini-golf.

properties.Name: You Kids Indoor Playground
properties.description: Ages 0-12. Jungle-themed indoor playground and trampoline park. Climbing, sliding, exploring for all ages. Combo tickets with jumping (age 2+). Free adult entry. Birthday parties available.

properties.Name: Jimmy's Speelparadijs
properties.description: Ideal 2-12 years. Amsterdam's massive indoor playground with climbing castle, go-kart track, toddler corner, soccer cage, scrambling tower, roller disco.

properties.Name: Monkey Town Amsterdam-Noord
properties.description: Ideal for ages 1-10. Multi-level climbing frames, ball pits, slides. Cafe with kid meals (€3-6). Socks required. Ample parking.

properties.Name: Monkey Town Amsterdam
properties.description: Ideal for ages 1-10. Multi-level climbing frames, ball pits, slides. Cafe with kid meals (€3-6). Socks required. Ample parking.

properties.Name: Candy Castle Speelparadijs
properties.description: Great for ages 2-8. Castle-themed playground with huge soft play structure and trampolines. Party rooms available. €8.50/child.

properties.Name: OBA De Hallen
properties.description: Ideal 4-12. De Hallen library with kids' section + small reading area. Adjacent cafe and play corner suitable for younger kids.

properties.Name: OBA Mercatorplein
properties.description: Ideal 2-12. Warm West library hosts multilingual storytimes, play area for toddlers, Maakplaats maker activities like 3D printing/lasercutting for older kids, and creative workshops.

properties.Name: OBA Olympic Quarter
properties.description: Ages 3-12. Zuidoost community spot with youth programs, Maakplaats digital crafting, storytimes, and school holiday activities building skills and stories.

properties.Name: OBA Oosterdok
properties.description: Ages 2-12. Largest Dutch library at Oosterdok with expansive kids' section, Maakplaats for 3D printing/coding/VR, multilingual storytimes, theater shows, and creative workshops.

properties.Name: OBA Van der Pek
properties.description: Ideal 0-6. Cozy neighborhood library in Oud-Noord with Voorleespret storytimes (4+), Boek op schoot lap reading (2-4), and youth workshops fostering early literacy and community play.

properties.Name: National Maritime Museum
properties.description: Ages 2+. Climb aboard replica East Indiaman Amsterdam to fire cannons and explore sailor life; Doris the Diver (2+) for underwater adventures; step inside giant whale in Tale of the Whale (6+); free junior audiotour.

properties.Name: Museum Batavialand
properties.description: Ideal 5-12. Explore full-scale VOC ship replica, working shipyard with blacksmiths/woodcarvers/sailmakers, Water Theater hands-on water management experiments, Flevoland history exhibits. Cafe serving coffee/cakes on weekends + holidays.

properties.Name: Ideal 2-12 years. Large wooden adventure playground in Utrecht's Maximapar with elevated tree trunk walkways, climbing towers, giant slide, cable car, water pump sluice system, tree swing, open-air amphitheater with surprise water jets, toddler area.
properties.description: Ideal ages 4+. 18-hole grass mini-golf course in scenic Amstelpark with water hazards, sand bunkers, windmills, obstacles; second traditional course for younger kids. Adjacent pancake restaurant and shaded terrace.

properties.Name: Suzuki Music for Babies & Toddlers
properties.description: Ideal for ages 0-3. Interactive Suzuki music classes with singing, movement, instruments + parent-child bonding at Cafe Belcampo. Builds rhythm, listening + social skills.

properties.Name: Luistergoed
properties.description: Music classes for ages 0-3. Playful music classes with singing, movement, world instruments + improvisation at Muziekpakhuis Amsterdam. Baby (5-18m) and toddler (18-36m) groups build musical foundations through exploration.

properties.Name: Muziekschool Amsterdam Noord
properties.description: 1.5+. Wide variety of music courses ("Getting to Know Music" courses for younger kids, introductoy courses for 6+, plug-n-play course to learn how to play in a band for ages 10+). Toddler and preschool dance classes also available.

properties.Name: Museum Speelklok
properties.description: Ideal 4+. Musical museum in Utrecht with self-playing instruments—street organs, music boxes, player pianos, automata; free guided tours bring machines to life; kids' scavenger hunt with Toon the monkey, Music Factory to compose songs, Escape Game (8+).

properties.Name: Naturalis Biodiversity Center
properties.description: All ages; ideal 3-12. Massive T-Rex + other dinos, ice age diorama, biodiversity hall, life cycles explained age-appropriately, plus workshops for older kids.

properties.Name: Natuurspeeltuin Cleyndertweg
properties.description: Ideal 1-12. Nature playground near Buikslotermeerpark with climbing structures/net, sand digging area, obstacle course, slides, swings.

properties.Name: Natuurspeeltuin Jeugdland Amsterdam
properties.description: Ideal 2-14 years. Large nature playgroundnear Flevopark with hut-building village, giant slide hill, climbing castles, swings, cable car over water, edible garden, natural pool, free seasonal workshops (crafts, watersports, nature play).

properties.Name: Speeltuin Willem de Zwijgerlaan
properties.description: Ideal 4-12. Neighborhood playground with standard equipment including swings, slides, climbing frames, sand/water play area. Adjacent to basketball court + skatepark.

properties.Name: Natuurspeelpark Sarphatipark
properties.description: Ideal 6-12. Compact nature playground tucked away in a wooded corner of Sarphatipark with rope course, zip line, treehouse + slide.

properties.Name: Speel Eiland
properties.description: Ideal 5+. Adventure islands in Amsterdamse Bos with self-operated ferry, rope bridges + climbing nets over water, water play zones, sand digging, shallow swimming areas. Open year-round but best in summer. Picnic area.

properties.Name: Natuurspeeltuin West
properties.description: Ideal 2-12. Large, wooded nature playground with climbing rock, tunnels, slides, swings, water play, nature trails, bikes, table tennis. "Hidden gem" tucked away in residential courtyard.

properties.Name: Zaanse Schans Windmills
properties.description: Ideal 3-12. Iconic working windmills, giant clog try-ons, cheese tasting farm, interactive Windmill Museum models, and chocolate shops delight kids with hands-on Dutch heritage.

properties.Name: Zuiderzeemuseum
properties.description: Ideal ages 4-12. Open-air living history museum in Enkhuizen recreating Zuiderzee fishing village with costumed demonstrators, traditional houses, workshops, old Dutch games, Water Expedition play area.

properties.Name: Archeon Museum Park
properties.description: Ages 4-12. Living history open-air museum in Alphen aan den Rijn recreating prehistoric huts, Roman baths/temples/legion camp, medieval farms/monasteries; hands-on with costumed interpreters—fire-making, sword-fighting, gladiator shows, marching with soldiers, crafts.

properties.Name: Kindijk Windmills
properties.description: Ideal 4-12. UNESCO-listed 19 working 18th-century windmills. Kids control miniature mill models, explore 2 interior museum mills, take narrated boat cruise. Visitor Center cafe offers coffie, pie, sandwiches, ice cream.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Beatrixpark
properties.description: Ideal 1-6 years. Large wading pool and spacious playground with seasonal kiosk selling ice creams, iced lattes, toasties, coffee, snacks.

properties.Name: Pierenbadje Gibraltarbad
properties.description: Ideal 1-6. Small pierenbadje in Bos en Lommer with shallow pool and small slide. Toilets and supervision in summer months.

properties.Name: AeroDMP Pierenbadje
properties.description: Perfect for ages 2-8. Dive-in pool with diving boards + shallow teaching area. Family-friendly, lockers available. North location, ample parking.

properties.Name: Kinderbadje Oosterpark
properties.description: Ideal 0-6. Shallow paddling pool in Oosterpark with mini fountain and slide. Kiosk for snacks + toilet accessible during opening hours. Ample grassy areas for picnic.

properties.Name: Groot Kinderbad Amsterdamse Bos
properties.description: Ideal 1-8. Large seasonal paddling pool in Amsterdamse Bos with adjacent playground with sand, slide, swings. Spacious grassy areas + picnic tables. Snack kiosk + toilets accessible during opening hours.

properties.Name: Kinderbadje Vondelpark
properties.description: Ideal 0-5. Shallow seasonal paddling pool in Vondelpark with adjacent sandpit and small playground. Ample grassy areas for picnics. Public toilets on site.

properties.Name: Kinderbadje Bellamyplein
properties.description: Ideal 1-5. Hidden gem with seasonal paddling pool and small playground at Bellamyplein.

properties.Name: Pierenbadje Noorderpark
properties.description: Ideal 1-6. Outdoor shallow wading pool with fountains, splash fountains, adjacent playground/sandpit.

properties.Name: Klein Kinderbad Amsterdamse Bos
properties.description: Ideal 0-6. Shallow paddling pool in Amsterdamse Bos perfect for babies/toddlers. Adjacent small playground with slide/seesaw. Kiosk for snacks + toilet accessible during opening hours. Ample grassy areas for picnic.

properties.Name: Fruittuin van West
properties.description: Perfect ages 2-10. Pick-your-own organic fruit (seasonal) + collect eggs. Market with organic products for sale. Cafe serves sandwiches, lemonade, apple pie. Play area adjacent to cafe.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Wachterliedplantsoen
properties.description: Ideal 1-10. Large playground with a variety of climbing structures, slides, swings, sandpits. Next to Wijkboerderij (petting zoo) and Paviljoen/Kiem Lokaal for cafe, toilet + activities.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Mercator
properties.description: Ideal 4-12. Neighborhood playground with standard equipment including swings, slides, climbing frames, sand/water play. Adjacent to basketball court + skatepark.

properties.Name: Speeltuin UJ Klaren
properties.description: Ideal 2-10. Large, fenced playground with swings, slides, climbing frames, sandpit, football field, water play, and traffic park with bikes and other toys. Picnic tables, water tap, toilets.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Nieuwendam
properties.description: Ideal 2-12. Supervised neighborhood playground with zip line, hut-building area, sandpits, swings, climbing frames, garden activities, football field.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Johnny Jordaan Plein
properties.description: Ideal 3-6. Compact neighborhood playground on Johnny Jordaanplein amid statues with swings, climbing frame + slide, seasaw.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Funenpark
properties.description: Ideal 1-12. Newly-built playground with two separate fenced areas for toddlers + bigger kids. Wooden play structures, rope obstacle course, climbing nets, slides, and lots of sand all around.

properties.Name: Piramide Speeltuin
properties.description: Ideal 3-6. Neighborhood playground near pyramid-shaped community center with climbing pyramid, swings, slides, wooden boat.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Kronkelpad
properties.description: Ideal 3-6. Small shaded playground with wooden play structure, rope walk, slide.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Frederik Hendrikplantsoen
properties.description: Ideal 2-12. Iconic elevated "Speelslinger" weaves high through the trees with three play towers: 3D climbing structure + elevated trampoline, rope/net towers with hammocks/spiral net. Slides, swings, sandpit for younger kids.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Middeliestraat
properties.description: Ideal 3-6. Small playground with climbing structure, slide, seesaw.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Flevopark
properties.description: Ideal 2-10. Shaded playground in Flevopark with slides, swings, cableway/zip line, seesaw, climbing equipment, balance ropes. Near Jeugdland adventure park and Flevoparkbad. Nearby Parknest community cafe offers refreshment + toilet access during opening hours.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Oosterpark II
properties.description: Ideal 2-5. Small playground wooden climbing towers, slides, swings, sandpits perfect for toddlers.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Herenmarkt
properties.description: Ideal 1-8. Fenced + shaded neighborhood playground with large sandpit, slide, swings, and wooden climbing frame.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Elandsgracht
properties.description: Ideal 1-5. Small, fenced neighborhood playground with sandbox, swing, climbing frame with slide, and bikes/toys.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Blijdag
properties.description: Ideal 0-12. Newly renovated massive inclusive playground in Amsteldorp with zip line over water, large slides, trampoline, waterplay, climbing towers. Separate zones for ages, 70% wheelchair accessible, 50% adaptive equipment.

properties.Name: Speeltuin SamSam Westerpark
properties.description: Ideal 1-6. Natural playground in Westerpark with swings, slides, playhouse, monkeybars, climbing structures, sandbox.

properties.Name: Zimmerterrein
properties.description: Ideal 2-10 years. Community green space in Amsterdam West with large playrgound with varied equipment (sandpit, slides, swings, climbing structures). Adjacent city farm (goats, sheep, chickens, rabbits, guinea pigs), grassy meadow, picnic areas.

properties.Name: Speeltuin De Waag
properties.description: Ideal 2-12. Fenced neighborhood playground in Nieuwmarktbuurt with large sandbox, climbing frame, swings, seesaw, sand/water table, table tennis, football field. Community cafe with snacks + toilet access during opening hours.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Van Tuyll
properties.description: Ideal 1-6. Small, fenced neighborhood playground with shared community toys, wooden playhouse, swings, slide, benches under trees.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Oosterpark
properties.description: Ideal 2-8. Playground in Oosterpark with 88m "Play Garland" climbing/slide structure on large sand pit. Little ones dig in the sand; bigger kids bounce on swings + hammocks.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Bloemenkwartier
properties.description: Ideal 1-12. Supervised layground bordering Noorderpark with large sandpit, water table, numerous swings, climbing structures, bikes/scooters, sloot pond for critter study, creative activities like hotdog roasting—play guidance with microscope nature exploration and clubs.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Lastageweg
properties.description: Ideal 3-10 years. Compact neighborhood playground tucked away on Lastageweg, featuring climbing structures, slides, mini-football pitch and open play space.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Amsterdam Zuid
properties.description: Ideal 1-10. Classic neighborhood playground with swings, slides, climbing frames, large sandpit, football goals. Fenced and shaded by mature trees. Community center with cafe + toilet access during opening hours.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Frankendael
properties.description: Ideal 1-5. Small playground for toddlers in Park Frankendael next to a stork nest chimney with sand box, slide, and playhouse

properties.Name: Speeltuin
properties.description: Ideal 3-6. Small playground with wooden play structure, climbing net, tunnel, slide, table tennis, mini football cage. Adjacent bigger football/sports field.

properties.Name: Speeltuin J.J. Cremerplein
properties.description: Ideal 2-12. Spacious urban playground with athletic field, table tennis, climbing tower, slide, swings, seesaw, playhouse. Toilets accessible during opening hours.

properties.Name: Theo Thijssen speelplaats
properties.description: Ideal 5-10. School-adjacent playground near Theo Thijssenschool with football field + various play equipment for older kids. Primarily for school use but neighborhood accessible during off-hours.

properties.Name: De Noorderspeeltuin
properties.description: Ideal 2-12. Large community playground in the Jordaan with swings, climbing frames, obstacle course, sandpit, football/basketball court, plus regular activities like dancing, sports, crafts through DOCK clubhuis.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Balboastraat
properties.description: Ideal 3-12 years. Neighborhood playground in Amsterdam West's Balboaplein with sandpit, climbing structure, slides, swings. Adjacent sports field + basketball court.

properties.Name: Speeltuin T Rex
properties.description: Ideal 3-12 years. Small fenced playground in Westerpark with sandpit, large climbing net, dinosaur spring rocker, wooden play structure.

properties.Name: Kippen- en Konijnenren Slootstraat
properties.description: Ideal 2-6 years. Neighborhood playground in the Jordaan with sandpit, climbing house, swings, other play equipment plus chicken coop and rabbit hutch where kids can watch (and sometimes feed) the animals cared for by volunteers.

properties.Name: De Gibraltar
properties.description: Ideal 1-12. Inclusive playground in Bos en Lommer with wheelchair-accessible swings, wide slides, climbing structures, trampolines, water play, sandpit, football area, bike track. Cafe with light bites + toilet facilities.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Rembrandtpark
properties.description: Great ages 3-9. Large climbing net with a slide, merry-go-round, seesaws, rockers for smaller kids.

properties.Name: Speeltuin van Beuningenplein
properties.description: Ideal 2-12 years. Neighborhood playground in Amsterdam West featuring custom climbing towers with slides, sand play area, swings, hammock forest, sports court, water features for summer splashing. Adjacent cafe for food, drink + facilities.

properties.Name: Houten Speeltuin
properties.description: Ideal ages 3-9. Wooden climbing structure with spiral slide, swings, seesaw in shaded park.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Sarphatipark
properties.description: Ideal 2-10. Nature playground in Sarphatipark (De Pijp) designed as a speelbos with climbing trees, nest tower, slide routes, cable bridges, climbing wall, plus fenced sand area for toddlers.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Van Gilsestraat
properties.description: Ideal 2-10 years. Fenced neighborhood playground with climbing structures, slides, swings, small football field.

properties.Name: Natuurspeelpark Het Diereneiland
properties.description: Ages 0-8. Kinderboerderij with goats, sheep, chickens, rabbits. Playground with water play, climbing structure, bikes. Kids can help feed the animals + participate in other activities. Free coffee and tea.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Erasmuspark
properties.description: Ideal 1-6 years. Playground with sand, wooden play structure, slides. Adjacent Terrasmus café with ample outdoor seating + facilities.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Tuindorp Oostzaan
properties.description: Ideal 1-12. Neighborhood playground next to pierenbad at Plejadenplein with water play, football field, swings, slides, climbing equipment, sandpits.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Ten Kateplein
properties.description: Ideal ages 3-9. Climbing structure with slide, swings amid planters. Splash pad in summer months. Adjacent sports fields.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Henrick De Keyser
properties.description: Ideal 2-10. Community-managed fenced playground in Amsterdam-Noord with swings, slides, climbing frames, sandpit, football pitch, picnic tables. Toilet + cafe at adjacent Buurtgebouw facilities.

properties.Name: De Vondeltuin
properties.description: All ages. Vondelpark terrace cafe with adjacent playground. Twin climbing towers with slides + huge sandpit. Fully fenced.

properties.Name: Groot Melkhuis
properties.description: Best for ages 1-6. Vondelpark's biggest playground with sandpit, swings + play structures. Adjacent cafe with huge terrace and shaded picnic tables. Toddler-friendly fencing. Summer splash pad.

properties.Name: Linnaeushof
properties.description: Ages 2-12. Europe's largest playground (350+ attractions) in Bennebroek near Haarlem. Toddler zone, water playground, cable cars, pedal boats, trampolines, super slide, mini-golf. Indoor play if rain. €9 parking. 30min drive from Amsterdam.

properties.Name: Speelpark de Swaan
properties.description: Ages 1.5-12. Largest playground in North Holland with 5 huge play areas, slides, zip lines, water play, inflatables, pedal boats.  Picnic areas.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Amstelpark
properties.description: Ideal 1-10. Classic Amstelpark playground with slides, zip lines, climbing net, swings, seesaws, sandpit. Area with paid rides (€1/token): bumper boats, mini cars, mini diggers, kid train. Snackbar, toilets + ample seating. Adjacent petting farm.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Frederiksplein
properties.description: Best for 3-6. Fenced-in playground with climbing structures, slides, round mini-football cage, sand/water play. Picnic tables, drinking fountain + shaded areas.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Mariotteplein
properties.description: Ages 0-12. Large, fenced-in playground with climbing structures, water play, sandbox, seesaws. Cafeteria + toilets available during opening times.

properties.Name: Speeltuin Wittenburg
properties.description: Best for ages 1-12. Large, fenced in playground with big sandbox, swings, bikes, zipline, and football cage. Water tap + clean toilets.

properties.Name: Monti's World Playroom
properties.description: Ages 0-3. Montessori indoor playroom with bookable infant/toddler sessions. Low shelves, child-sized furniture, open play space. Free coffee/tea for parents. Max 10 guests for calm atmosphere.

properties.Name: Robbeburg International Playgroup
properties.description: Great for ages 1-4. English/Dutch playgroup + indoor playground. Structured play + crafts. International families welcome.

properties.Name: Pool Aquamar
properties.description: All ages. Modern family pool in Katwijk (40min from Amsterdam) with waterslide, whirlpool, toddler pool with fountains/slide, spraypark, recreational/competition pools, swim lessons.

properties.Name: Flevoparkbad
properties.description: All ages. Heated outdoor pool complex in Flevopark. Olympic 50m pool, kids instruction pool (40-150cm), toddler paddling pool. Heated water. Large sunbathing lawns, playground nearby. Seasonal (April-Sept).

properties.Name: De Mirandabad
properties.description: All ages. Subtropical indoor waterpark with heated wave pool, slides, toddler area. 25m sport pool + seasonal 50m outdoor pool. Family swim sessions, changing rooms + lockers.

properties.Name: Het Marnix
properties.description: All ages. Indoor pool in Jordaan with canal views. 25m pool + family swim lessons. Family changing rooms, swim school on-site.

properties.Name: Noorderparkbad
properties.description: All ages. Modern indoor/outdoor complex with shallow kids pool + paddling area. Family swim sessions, changing rooms with baby stations. outdoor pools when >19°C.

properties.Name: The Railway Museum
properties.description: Ideal 2-12. Utrecht's immersive train adventure with real steam locomotives to climb, vintage station play, interactive signal boxes, and kid-sized railcars. Cafe with kid menu + indoor/outdoor seating.

properties.Name: Fluffy Cafe/Restaurant
properties.description: Ideal 0-8 years. Cozy kid-friendly café-restaurant on Amstelveen’s Stadsplein with specialty coffee, brunch plates, pancakes, cakes, and simple kids’ dishes plus a small but well-designed play corner so parents can relax while little ones play.

properties.Name: Patio Amsterdam
properties.description: All ages. Sunny Spanish café next to Rembrandtpark serving fusion dishes, tapas, coffee, and wine all day on a spacious terrace perfect for family lunches or early dinners post-park play. Small inside courtyard with toys.

properties.Name: Hans & Grietje Pancake House
properties.description: Ideal ages 2-10. Fairy-tale themed pancake restaurant with interactive features like moving tables, shaking floors, and a witch's organ show. Large outdoor playground, heksengolf (witch mini-golf), and forest paths. Reservations recommended in peak times.

properties.Name: Brunchdale
properties.description: Ideal 2-8 years. All-day brunch spot in Amsterdam Noord with pancakes, eggs Benedict, avocado toast, kids pancakes, and small play corner suitable for toddlers. Welcoming vibe for families.

properties.Name: Café Restaurant Hoogendam
properties.description: Ideal 3-8 years. French cuisine with sunny waterfront terrace + urban jungle vibe. Kid friendly with toys, high chairs + changing table.

properties.Name: De VerbroederIJ
properties.description: Ideal 3-8 years. Community beach café with pavilion in Amsterdam Noord. Small plates, lunch/dinner (no kids menu). Kids play in the sand + visit with friendly pigs.

properties.Name: Dignita Hoftuin
properties.description: All ages; play corner ideal for 2-6. Garden cafés serving all-day brunch with organic, garden-fresh dishes. Located in serene courtyard behind H'ART Museum with kids corner indoors, safe play space outdoors near the dining area.

properties.Name: Dignita Vondelpark
properties.description: All ages; play corner ideal for 2-6. Garden café serving all-day brunch with organic, garden-fresh dishes. Located near Vondelpark entrance. Small kids corner.

properties.Name: Lilo's cafe
properties.description: Ideal 0-6 years. Child-focused café in Amsterdam Noord offering healthy organic breakfast/lunch: sandwiches, yogurt bowls, fruit pancakes. Baby cribs, castle-themed play area for toddlers.

properties.Name: Restaurant Pof
properties.description: All ages. Local, mostly vegetarian/vegan restaurant on urban farm in Amsterdam Noord. Kids' menu with poffertjes and sandwiches. Indoor play corner, adjacent natuurspeeltuin, farm animals nearby.

properties.Name: The Science Camp
properties.description: Activities available for 3+. Explosive experiments, LEGO robotics, chemistry reactions, astronomy adventures, and STEAM engineering in holiday camps, after-school sessions, and birthday parties.

properties.Name: Micropia
properties.description: Best for ages 5+. World's first microbe museum—see bacteria dancing under microscopes! Quiet, indoor, perfect rainy days. Combined Artis Zoo ticket (€27/adult).

properties.Name: NEMO Science Museum
properties.description: Ideal for ages 4-14. Hands-on science across 5 floors—experiment in real labs, rooftop splash pad in summer. Book tickets online (€17.50/adult, kids €17.50). Stroller storage available.

properties.Name: CORPUS Museum
properties.description: Ideal 6-12 (advisory 6+). Giant human body walkthrough—travel as red blood cell through 5D heart theater, lungs, intestines, pancreas, kidneys to brain command center.

properties.Name: Space Expo
properties.description: Ideal 4-12. Interactive space mission logbook, simulators, and hands-on rocket building—fuel for space-obsessed kids.

properties.Name: Amsterdams Marionetten Theater
properties.description: Ages 3+. Live puppet shows near Nieuwmarkt. 30-min performances, very interactive.

properties.Name: Black Cat Theatre
properties.description: Ages 1-6. Tiny tots theater in West Amsterdam—interactive, songs, play, movement. Post-show playtime.

properties.Name: De Toverknol Kindertheater
properties.description: Ideal 1-9. Intimate Amsterdam theater with dress-up, interactive puppet/story shows on themes like friendship and sharing; sing, dance, and laugh. Snacks + limonade for kids.

properties.Name: Koos Kneus Poppentheater
properties.description: Ages 2-8. Cozy Oost puppet shows Sundays with humor, music, free face painting, and snacks—two sessions: ages 2-4 and 4-8.

properties.Name: Teatro Munganga
properties.description: Ideal 2-8. Cozy Vondelpark-adjacent theater hosts Brazilian-inspired kids' shows, music/story sessions, and family carnivals blending culture, dance, and play. Very interactive + lively!

properties.Name: Treasure Island Zeumeren
properties.description: Ages 2-12. Largest pirate-themed indoor/outdoor playground (6500m²) in Voorthuizen with play castle, maze, sea battle cannons, underwater world, play ship, splash pond, sand table, shows, gold panning, mini karts, toddler corner.

properties.Name: Adventure Farm Molenwaard
properties.description: Ideal 2-8 years. Fien & Teun themed farm park with tractor rides, pony rides, fruit cart tracks, vegetable garden planting, animal petting, playgrounds, indoor play barn, seasonal shows/parades, polder boat rides.

properties.Name: Drievliet Family Park
properties.description: Ideal 2-12. Compact Hague family park with 40+ rides including toddler Wonderland (carousels, indoor climbing), family coasters, water battles/spray park. 90% rides accessible for kids over 1 meter.

properties.Name: Duinrell
properties.description: Ideal 2-12. Amusement park with 40+ rides including toddler-friendly Wonderland, family coasters, summer toboggan ride, plus massive Tiki Pool waterslides.

properties.Name: Madurodam
properties.description: Ideal 2-12. Miniature Netherlands showcases tiny Schiphol planes taking off, working Delta Works floodgates kids control, miniature windmills turning, Amsterdam canals with boats. Additional indoor attractions.

properties.Name: Sprookjeswonderland
properties.description: Ideal 1-8. Fairy tale forest with gnome village, Snow White house, interactive rides (ladybug boats, toddler cars, carousel), petting zoo, massive playground, and puppet shows.

properties.Name: Walibi Holland
properties.description: Ideal 3-12 (best 6-12). Thrill-packed theme park with 40+ rides including kid-friendly Play Land, water rides, plus thrilling coasters for older kids.

properties.Name: Verkeerstuin Amersfoort
properties.description: Ideal 3-12 years. Free indoor go-kart track in Amersfoort's old train shed with roads, traffic lights, roundabouts, crossings; kids learn traffic rules safely.

properties.Name: Electric Tram Museum Amsterdam
properties.description: Ideal 4-12. Historic tram rides on Line 30 from Haarlemmermeerstation to Amstelveen and city tours from Dam Square—explore vintage trams, nostalgic wooden interiors, and scenic routes.

properties.Name: Museumstoomtram Hoorn-Medemblik
properties.description: Ideal 3-12. Historic steam tram adventure through countryside from Hoorn to Medemblik—chug past tulip fields, stop at vintage stations, order poffertjes on board.

properties.Name: Modelbouwvereniging het 'Y'
properties.description: Ideal 3-12 years. Model train club with 600m outdoor miniature railway tracks. Kids ride passenger cars pulled by live steam/diesel locomotives on Sundays (April-September) plus special events.

properties.Name: De Amsteltrein
properties.description: All ages. Charming miniature train ride circling Amsterdam's scenic Amstelpark—15-minute loop past rose gardens, rhododendron valley, windmill, ponds, hedge maze. Fun family ride near playground, petting zoo, mini-golf nearby.

properties.Name: VROG
properties.description: Access for ages 2+, more ideal for 4+. 3,000m² indoor freerunning & trampoline park. Parkour training, urban dance classes, birthday parties from age 4. MiniVROG sessions from age 2.

properties.Name: Rotterdam Zoo
properties.description: All ages. Rotterdam's Diergaarde Blijdorp with Oceanium shark tunnel, gorillas, elephants, polar bears. Indoor playground, butterfly garden. Multiple cafés throughout.

properties.Name: Almere Jungle
properties.description: Great for ages 1-10. Indoor animal park + botanical garden across 5 continents. Raccoons, alpacas, marmosets, snakes, caimans. Interactive scavenger hunt, playground, bouncy castle. Jungle Café. 30min drive from Amsterdam.

properties.Name: Artis Zoo
properties.description: All ages. Central Amsterdam zoo with 900+ animals (giraffes, lions, penguins, gorillas). Butterfly pavilion, aquarium, planetarium. Multiple cafés. Playgrounds throughout.

properties.Name: Dierenpark Amersfoort
properties.description: All ages. Amersfoort zoo with bottlenose dolphins, red pandas, African penguins. Dino Forest, chimpanzee climbing valley, adventure paths through enclosures. Multiple cafés.

properties.Name: Ouwehands Zoo
properties.description: All ages. Rhenen zoo famous for giant pandas, polar bears, gorillas. Indoor jungle playground, sea lion shows. Multiple cafés. 45min drive/train from Amsterdam.

properties.Name: Pantropica
properties.description: Ideal for ages 2-10. Tropical greenhouse adventure with free-roaming butterflies, monkeys, birds + interactive feeding zones. Walk-through immersion + play areas. Family tickets available.

properties.Name: Reptile House Earth
properties.description: Ideal ages 2+. Breda reptile zoo with lizards, snakes, crocodiles, tortoises. Hands-on snake holding, tropical jungle atmosphere. Child-friendly, drawing area for kids.

properties.Name: Vogelpark Avifauna
properties.description: All ages. Bird park with 100+ species, lory feeding, bird shows. Lemurs, red pandas, giant anteater. Massive playground with trampolines, slides, go-karts. Lakeside location near Alphen.
